preparation.raw_text:

 2. In a clean, dry container, combine 12 g of Carbon, 32 g of Oxygen, 62 g of Phosphorus, and 180 g of Zirconium. 
 3. Stir the mixture thoroughly for 10 minutes to ensure even distribution of all components.
